Qval 1.2.4
  • Reference
  • Changelog

    Simulate Mis-specifications in Q-matrix

    sim.MQ.Rd

    simulate certain rate mis-specifications in the Q-matrix.

    sim.MQ(Q, rate, verbose = TRUE)

    Arguments

    Q

    The Q-matrix (sim.Q) that need to simulate mis-specifications.

    rate

    The ratio of mis-specifications in the Q-matrix.

    verbose

    Logical indicating to print information or not. Default is TRUE

    Value

    An object of class matrix.

    Author

    Haijiang Qin <Haijiang133@outlook.com>

    Examples

    library(Qval)

set.seed(123)

Q <- sim.Q(5, 10)
print(Q)
#>         A1 A2 A3 A4 A5
#> item 1   0  0  1  0  0
#> item 2   0  0  0  0  1
#> item 3   0  1  0  0  0
#> item 4   0  0  1  0  0
#> item 5   1  0  0  0  0
#> item 6   0  0  0  1  0
#> item 7   1  0  0  0  0
#> item 8   0  1  0  0  0
#> item 9   0  0  0  0  1
#> item 10  0  0  0  1  0

MQ <- sim.MQ(Q, 0.1)
#> rate of mis-specifications =  0.1 
#>  rate of  over-specifications =  0.08 
#>  rate of under-specifications =  0.02 
print(MQ)
#>         A1 A2 A3 A4 A5
#> item 1   0  1  1  0  0
#> item 2   0  0  0  0  1
#> item 3   0  1  0  0  0
#> item 4   0  0  1  0  0
#> item 5   0  0  1  0  1
#> item 6   0  0  0  1  0
#> item 7   1  0  0  0  0
#> item 8   0  1  0  0  0
#> item 9   1  0  0  0  1
#> item 10  0  0  0  1  0
